title: Ready-to-start checklist (Definition of Ready)
content_md:
# Ready-to-start checklist (Definition of Ready)

A ticket is ready when it can move from Unassigned to To Do.

1. **Goal present** — Non-empty, no placeholder.
2. **Human-verifiable deliverable present** — Concrete description.
3. **Acceptance criteria** — At least one `- [ ]` checkbox.
4. **Constraints + Non-goals** — Both sections with content.
5. **No placeholders** — No `<AC 1>`, `<task-id>`, etc.

title: Ticket Template
content_md:
# Ticket Template

Use this structure when creating tickets. Replace placeholders with concrete content.

## Ticket
- **ID**: (assigned by tool)
- **Title**: (short title)
- **Goal (one sentence)**: <what we want to achieve>
- **Human-verifiable deliverable (UI-only)**: <what a human will see/click>
- **Acceptance criteria (UI-only)**: - [ ] <AC 1> etc.
- **Constraints**: Keep task small; verification UI-only (no console).
- **Non-goals**: <out of scope>

Required: Goal, deliverable, AC with checkboxes, Constraints, Non-goals. No angle-bracket placeholders in final ticket.

title: hal tool call contract
content_md:
# HAL Tool Call Contract

Agents call HAL API for Supabase operations. No credentials needed.

**Endpoints:** POST to base URL from `.hal/api-base-url`:
- `/api/artifacts/insert-implementation` — `{ ticketId, artifactType, title, body_md }`
- `/api/artifacts/insert-qa` — `{ ticketId, title, body_md }`
- `/api/artifacts/get` — `{ ticketId }`
- `/api/tickets/get`, `/api/tickets/update`, `/api/tickets/move` — `{ ticketId, ... }`

**8 implementation artifact types:** plan, worklog, changed-files, decisions, verification, pm-review, git-diff, instructions-used.
